longDesc: A raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
detailedDesc: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest. Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.

longDesc: A large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
detailedDesc: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of rest.

longDesc: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
detailedDesc: This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow and black.

longDesc: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
detailedDesc: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature. The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

longDesc: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
detailedDesc: He's big, mean, and purple.  Watch out! He's big, mean, and purple.  Watch out!

longDesc: A very large brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello.'
detailedDesc: Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!' Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

longDesc: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
detailedDesc: He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large, He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large, engraved cutlass.  He has an especially haughty air about him.

longDesc: The nomad commander stands here staring at you suspiciously.
detailedDesc: This is the nomad leader's second in command.  His clothes are richly woven This is the nomad leader's second in command.  His clothes are richly woven of silk and gold thread.  A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

longDesc: A proud nomad warrior stands here.
detailedDesc: This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean. This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean.

longDesc: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.
detailedDesc: She looks quite thin and weak. She looks quite thin and weak.

longDesc: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
detailedDesc: The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it. The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it. Obviously it no longer fears death.

longDesc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDesc: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent. This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

longDesc: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
detailedDesc: The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those rocks.
The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the same effect).

longDesc: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
detailedDesc: The shaman shoots spores into the air. The shaman shoots spores into the air.

longDesc: A small oasis invites you to dive in.
detailedDesc: Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why it seems to be moving about...

longDesc: A very dangerous creature, a camel, snorts at you.
detailedDesc: It is advisable not to mess with this creature.  After all, you It is advisable not to mess with this creature.  After all, you have heard many a horror story about experiences with camels. Bad experiences.
